uk.uncodedstudios.uncode2d.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.uncodedstudios.uncode2d.graphics.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedSprite

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing variables to set up a sprite.
    Version:
    1.0 - 2013-04-12
    Author:
    Figglewatts

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex, int x, int y)
      Creates a sprite with a texture and an X and Y position.
      Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex, int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Creates a sprite with a texture and 4 values containing the X, Y, Width and Height.
      Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle rect)
      Creates a sprite with a texture and a rectangle.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex,
      int x,
      int y)
        Creates a sprite with a texture and an X and Y position. The dimensions are the textures width and height by default.
        Parameters:
        tex - The texture of the sprite.
        x - The X position of the sprite.
        y - The Y position of the sprite.

      • Sprite

      int x,
      int y,
      int w,
      int h)
        Creates a sprite with a texture and 4 values containing the X, Y, Width and Height.
        Parameters:
        tex - The texture of the sprite.
        x - The X position of the sprite.
        y - The Y position of the sprite.
        w - The width of the sprite.
        h - The height of the sprite.
